name: Not Quite Dead - Chapter 1
description:
[Fullscreen recommended] [Incognito mode/Browser Cookie Settings breaks the game]

It's your day off, your neighbors aren't blasting their music, and your apartment has a rare sense of quiet to it. Very quiet. 

Too quiet. 

Explore your apartment, find answers, or find something far worse. 

Again. 

And again.

And again. 

But perhaps there's something to be gleaned from all that failure. 

The end of one story is merely the beginning of another. 

This is chapter one of a twine project I thought of and created about a year ago, but never uploaded. There are 20 or so hidden lines within the game so far, a slew of codes for unimplemented features, a unique ending, and one hidden path. 

This story's future is currently uncertain.
